summary: This is my First Mod to bring Hermione Granger/Emma Watson to Skyrim.
descriptionHtml:
Hermione Granger, the brightest witch of her age has come to Skyrim!

This mod in its current stage is early, with normal follower AI, but a essential foundation for things to come! Stay tuned for further updates!!!

Features Included In V1.2~
Follower - Fully Functional as Recruitable/Marriage Opportunity.
Save game - Clean new game & Starts off in Riverwood Trader, Level 1. Only Unbound quest has been completed.

Features Planned~ (Keeping it Lore-Friendly as I can.)
Advanced AI
Closer Resemblance to Emma Watson In HP Universe.
Custom Outfit
Custom Dialog
Custom Voice(Need help with a voice actor)
Custom Quest
Much More!

REQUIREMENTSÂ» Many thanks to the Authors!
ApachiiSkyHair (Essential For Both)
CharacterMakingExtender (Need only for save game)
EyesOfBeauty (Need only for save game)
--------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
The Golden Sorceress Armor, Wand, or Red Tower Robe she is wearing is NOT my making OR included. Merely cosmetic.

If you got any ideas, suggestions, questions, or any known bugs with my mod. Feel free to send a message/post in the comments. I am always looking for more ideas to make this mod the best of my ability/those in the community wishing to help. I want to thank Bethesda, all the incredible mod makers, and players who keep this game great day by day!

SPOILER BELOW TO GET THE FOLLOWER!

Change log~
v1.2 - removed unused parent master/added few spells for follower
v1.1 - fixed follower AI/outfit/grey face/released save game
v1 - released follower

















Hermione can be found at the College of Winterhold, Hall of Attainment.
author: NickAppoz
